text: The South Korea national under-17 football team represents South Korea in youth international football completion. They have attended both the FIFA U-17 World Cup and the AFC U-17 Asian Cup. They hosted the 2007 edition on their home ground. == Competitive record == Champions Runners-up Third place Tournament played on home soil === FIFA U-17 World Cup === FIFA U-17 World Cup record Year
